video_prompt: Character's mechanical limbs articulate and extend. Fabric billows and shifts. Her gaze flickers. Background text and schematics subtly animate and change.  The scene pulses with a subtle, futuristic energy.
image_prompt: Cyberpunk full-length anime illustration of a woman in futuristic, mechanical white and orange attire against a stark white background with sci-fi schematics and text (GAAT LUCE TOCF). She has blonde hair and light brown eyes, holding mechanical limbs, and wears a futuristic white and black dress with a '6' emblem.
refined_video_prompt: Mechanical limbs articulate and extend. Fabric billows and shifts. Her gaze subtly flickers, conveying shifts in thought. Background text and schematics animate, morphing and reforming. The scene subtly pulses with a futuristic energy.
